title: Ticket #4050: detect and attempt to avoid problems caused by DNS lookup delays
description:
There have been several instances where doing a DNS lookup blocks for several seconds, causing trouble for a busy HTCondor machine such as cascading timeouts. See ticket #3097 for one such example.

Also, resolving the DNS names in ALLOW_ lists is done "lazily" which means it often happens while in the process of sending or receiving a command. If an entry is in mutliple ALLOW_ lists, it is looked up several times, which is inefficient. Also, the logging of failures is only done to D_FULLDEBUG, making the problem difficult to diagnose. This ticket exists to improve the situation.

Design doc here: 4050 Design Doc: Improve DNS resolution in ALLOW_* and DENY_* lists
